Most IDEs don't use your classpath variable. You have to configure 
the cla=
sspath in your IDE's project options. How to do this depends 
on the IDE yo=
u are using.

The best way to get this question answered is to search in th=
e IDE's 
documentation how to add a jar to your project classpath.

Regards=
, Jan

wrote:
